Installation
============

.. WARNING::

   Tested on Linux (Debian, CentOS) only

   Rerequiresite: python (v2)

Direct download
---------------

::

    wget -c https://raw.githubusercontent.com/uxiyon/showchord/master/showchord
    chmod u+x showchord


With git
--------

If you have git installed on your system, you can clone the whole bunch of files:

::

    git clone https://github.com/uxiyon/showchord
    cd showchord
